Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: Westbound 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand,Fairbanks, Ontario and State: due to,street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63W West 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand,Fairbanks, Ontario and Stateincluding the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
